constraints.name: digit_set_constraint
constraints.description: 每个数位的取值必须在给定的集合中

constraints.name: non_empty_result
constraints.description: 结果不能为空，即使输入为0

constraints.name: leading_zeros_allowed
constraints.description: 允许前导零，但应尽量避免过多
constraints.formal: leading zeros allowed, but should be minimized

constraints.name: impossible_conversion
constraints.description: 如果无法转换成指定进制表示，则输出IMPOSSIBLE
